verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Shoshannim Eduth. A Psalm of Asaph. Give ea <WH238>, O Shepherd <WH7462> of Israel <WH3478>, Thou that leadest <WH5090> Joseph <WH3130> like a flock <WH6629>; Thou that sittest <WH3427> above the cherubim <WH3742>, shine forth <WH3313>.
Before <WH6440> Ephraim <WH669> and Benjamin <WH1144> and Manasseh <WH4519>, stir up <WH5782> thy might <WH1369>, And come <WH3212> to save us <WH3444>.
Turn us again <WH7725>, O God <WH430>; And cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215>, and we shall be saved <WH3467>.
O Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, How long wilt thou be angry <WH6225> against the prayer <WH8605> of thy people <WH5971>?
Thou hast fed <WH398> them with the bread <WH3899> of tears <WH1832>, And given them tears <WH1832> to drink <WH8248> in large measure <WH7991>.
Thou makest <WH7760> us a strife <WH4066> unto our neighbors <WH7934>; And our enemies <WH341> laugh among themselves <WH3932>.
Turn us again <WH7725>, O God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>; And cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215>, and we shall be saved <WH3467>.
Thou broughtest <WH5265> a vine <WH1612> out of Egypt <WH4714>: Thou didst drive out <WH1644> the nations <WH1471>, and plantedst it <WH5193>.
Thou preparedst <WH6437> room before <WH6440> it <WH8328>, And it took deep root <WH8327>, and filled <WH4390> the land <WH776>.
The mountains <WH2022> were covered <WH3680> with the shadow <WH6738> of it <WH6057>, And the boughs thereof were like cedars <WH730> of God <WH410>.
It sent out <WH7971> its branches <WH3127> unto the sea <WH3220>, And its shoots <WH3127> unto the River <WH5104>.
Why hast thou broken down <WH6555> its walls <WH1447>, So that all they that pass <WH5674> by the way <WH1870> do pluck it <WH717>?
The boar <WH2386> out of the wood <WH3293> doth ravage <WH3765> it <WH2123>, And the wild beasts of the field <WH7704> feed on it <WH7462>.
Turn <WH7725> again <WH430>, we beseech thee, O God of hosts <WH6635>: Look down <WH5027> from heaven <WH8064>, and behold <WH7200>, and visit <WH6485> this vine <WH1612>,
And the stock <WH3657> which thy right hand <WH3225> planted <WH5193>, And the branch <WH1121> that thou madest strong for thyself <WH553>.
It is burned <WH8313> with fire <WH784>, it is cut down <WH3683>: They perish <WH6> at the rebuke <WH1606> of thy countenance <WH6440>.
Let thy hand <WH3027> be upon the man <WH376> of thy right hand <WH3225>, Upon the son <WH1121> of man <WH120> whom thou madest strong for thyself <WH553>.
So shall we not go back <WH5472> from thee <WH2421>: Quicken thou us <WH7121>, and we will call upon thy name <WH8034>.
Turn us again <WH7725>, O Jehovah <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>; Cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215>, and we shall be saved <WH3467>.
